ComicInfo.Series: The Stand: The Night Has Come
ComicInfo.Summary:
The final reckoning is upon us, True Believers, as Larry, Ralph, and Glen are arrested and brought before the Dark Man for sentencing--and execution. Everything has been leading to this last stand, Good against Evil, but there is one more surprise waiting for Flagg, out in the desert, coming towards Vegas like the Wrath of God...
Note - on page 20 there is a Stephen King cameo as "Richard Bachman" which is one of his pennames.
